mapper.select: SELECT b_id, m_id, b_title, b_contents, b_regdate, b_view_cnt, b_like_cnt, b_type, b_is_maintain, b_retention_period FROM BOARD WHERE b_type = 2
SELECT b_id, m_id, b_title, b_contents, b_regdate, b_view_cnt, b_like_cnt, b_type, b_is_maintain, b_retention_period FROM BOARD WHERE b_type = 2 ORDER BY b_view_cnt DESC
SELECT b_id, m_id, b_title, b_contents, b_regdate, b_view_cnt, b_like_cnt, b_type, b_is_maintain, b_retention_period FROM BOARD WHERE b_type = 1
SELECT b_id, m_id, b_title, b_contents, b_regdate, b_view_cnt, b_like_cnt, b_type, b_is_maintain, b_retention_period FROM BOARD WHERE b_type = 1 ORDER BY b_view_cnt DESC
